body: Greg Weeks updates his readers on the "Gasolinazo": "Evo Morales revoked the decree removing subsidies (and thereby drastically raising prices on fuel) after facing large scale protests. The essential problem therefore remains--the government has popular subsidies that unfortunately also encourage smuggling and bleed money, both of which he mentioned in his remarks."
original_body: Greg Weeks updates his readers on the "Gasolinazo": "Evo Morales revoked the decree removing subsidies (and thereby drastically raising prices on fuel) after facing large scale protests. The essential problem therefore remains--the government has popular subsidies that unfortunately also encourage smuggling and bleed money, both of which he mentioned in his remarks."
title: Bolivia: Government Revokes Decree Ending Fuel Subsidies
